text: pinnit atin sesavum ninnalute manas'sukal katuttupeayi. ava parapealeyea atinekkal katuttatea ayi bhaviccu. parakalil cilatil ninn nadikal peatti olukaruntâ€Œ. cilat pilarnn vellam puratt varunnu. cilat daivabhayattal taleatt uruntu vilukayum ceyyunnu. ninnal pravarttikkunna yateannineparriyum allahu ottum asrad'dhanalla
